titleStmt.title: By the Queene. Whereas diuers traiterous and slanderous libels haue of late beene dispersed in diuers parts of our citie of London ...
Proclamations. 1601-04-05
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Offering L.100 reward for information on sources of seditious libels.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
